data.title: Ma Ya Shu
data.text:
Profile

Name: 马雅舒 (马娅舒) / Ma Ya Shu

Also known as: 丫丫 / Ya Ya

Profession: Actress

Birthdate: 1977-Mar-24 (age 47)

Birthplace: Kunming, Yunnan, China

Height: 166cm

Star sign: Aries

Chinese zodiac: Snake

Blood type: AB

Family: Husband / entrepreneur James Robert Hayes, daughter Mia Hayes (b. 2013), and son Aiden Hayes (b. 2015)

Talent agency: Super Creature Media

TV Series

Xian Yu (2025) as Shi Gandu

Trivia

Education: National Academy of Chinese Theatre Arts (Performing Arts Department)

Hobbies: Music, guzheng, horseback riding and swimming.

Languages: Mandarin and Yunnan dialect

Ethnicity: Hui

Previously married to actor Nicky Wu but divorced in 2009.

Baidu Baike

Weibo
